parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the specified resource. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.
